6042
6043void QGraphicsScenePrivate::enterModal(QGraphicsItem *panel, QGraphicsItem::PanelModality previousModality)
6044{
6045 Q_Q(QGraphicsScene);
6046 Q_ASSERT(panel && panel->isPanel());
6047
6048 QGraphicsItem::PanelModality panelModality = panel->d_ptr->panelModality;
6049 if (previousModality != QGraphicsItem::NonModal) {
6050 // the panel is changing from one modality type to another... temporarily set it back so
6051 // that blockedPanels is populated correctly
6052 panel->d_ptr->panelModality = previousModality;
6053 }
6054
6055 QSet<QGraphicsItem *> blockedPanels;
6056 {
6057 const auto items_ = q->items();
6058 for (const auto &item : items_) {
6059 if (item->isPanel() && item->isBlockedByModalPanel())
6060 blockedPanels.insert(value: item);
6061 }
6062 }
6063 // blockedPanels contains all currently blocked panels
6064
6065 if (previousModality != QGraphicsItem::NonModal) {
6066 // reset the modality to the proper value, since we changed it above
6067 panel->d_ptr->panelModality = panelModality;
6068 // remove this panel so that it will be reinserted at the front of the stack
6069 modalPanels.removeAll(t: panel);
6070 }
6071
6072 modalPanels.prepend(t: panel);
6073
6074 if (!hoverItems.isEmpty()) {
6075 // send GraphicsSceneHoverLeave events to newly blocked hoverItems
6076 QGraphicsSceneHoverEvent hoverEvent;
6077 hoverEvent.setScenePos(lastSceneMousePos);
6078 dispatchHoverEvent(hoverEvent: &hoverEvent);
6079 }
6080
6081 if (!mouseGrabberItems.isEmpty() && lastMouseGrabberItemHasImplicitMouseGrab) {
6082 QGraphicsItem *item = mouseGrabberItems.constLast();
6083 if (item->isBlockedByModalPanel())
6084 ungrabMouse(item, /*itemIsDying =*/ false);
6085 }
6086
6087 QEvent windowBlockedEvent(QEvent::WindowBlocked);
6088 QEvent windowUnblockedEvent(QEvent::WindowUnblocked);
6089 const auto items_ = q->items();
6090 for (const auto &item : items_) {
6091 if (item->isPanel()) {
6092 if (!blockedPanels.contains(value: item) && item->isBlockedByModalPanel()) {
6093 // send QEvent::WindowBlocked to newly blocked panels
6094 sendEvent(item, event: &windowBlockedEvent);
6095 } else if (blockedPanels.contains(value: item) && !item->isBlockedByModalPanel()) {
6096 // send QEvent::WindowUnblocked to unblocked panels when downgrading
6097 // a panel from SceneModal to PanelModal
6098 sendEvent(item, event: &windowUnblockedEvent);
6099 }
6100 }
6101 }
6102}
6103
6104void QGraphicsScenePrivate::leaveModal(QGraphicsItem *panel)
6105{
6106 Q_Q(QGraphicsScene);
6107 Q_ASSERT(panel && panel->isPanel());
6108
6109 QSet<QGraphicsItem *> blockedPanels;
6110 {
6111 const auto items_ = q->items();
6112 for (const auto &item : items_) {
6113 if (item->isPanel() && item->isBlockedByModalPanel())
6114 blockedPanels.insert(value: item);
6115 }
6116 }
6117
6118 modalPanels.removeAll(t: panel);
6119
6120 {
6121 QEvent e(QEvent::WindowUnblocked);
6122 const auto items_ = q->items();
6123 for (const auto &item : items_) {
6124 if (item->isPanel() && blockedPanels.contains(value: item) && !item->isBlockedByModalPanel())
6125 sendEvent(item, event: &e);
6126 }
6127 }
6128
6129 // send GraphicsSceneHoverEnter events to newly unblocked items
6130 QGraphicsSceneHoverEvent hoverEvent;
6131 hoverEvent.setScenePos(lastSceneMousePos);
6132 dispatchHoverEvent(hoverEvent: &hoverEvent);
6133}
6134
6135#ifndef QT_NO_GESTURES
6136void QGraphicsScenePrivate::gestureTargetsAtHotSpots(const QSet<QGesture *> &gestures,
6137 Qt::GestureFlag flag,
6138 QHash<QGraphicsObject *, QSet<QGesture *> > *targets,
6139 QSet<QGraphicsObject *> *itemsSet,
6140 QSet<QGesture *> *normal,
6141 QSet<QGesture *> *conflicts)
6142{
6143 QSet<QGesture *> normalGestures; // that are not in conflicted state.
6144 for (QGesture *gesture : gestures) {
6145 if (!gesture->hasHotSpot())
6146 continue;
6147 const Qt::GestureType gestureType = gesture->gestureType();
6148 const QList<QGraphicsItem *> items = itemsAtPosition(screenPos: QPoint(), scenePos: gesture->d_func()->sceneHotSpot, widget: nullptr);
6149 for (int j = 0; j < items.size(); ++j) {
6150 QGraphicsItem *item = items.at(i: j);
6151
6152 // Check if the item is blocked by a modal panel and use it as
6153 // a target instead of this item.
6154 (void) item->isBlockedByModalPanel(blockingPanel: &item);
6155
6156 if (QGraphicsObject *itemobj = item->toGraphicsObject()) {
6157 QGraphicsItemPrivate *d = item->QGraphicsItem::d_func();
6158 QMap<Qt::GestureType, Qt::GestureFlags>::const_iterator it =
6159 d->gestureContext.constFind(key: gestureType);
6160 if (it != d->gestureContext.constEnd() && (!flag || (it.value() & flag))) {
6161 if (normalGestures.contains(value: gesture)) {
6162 normalGestures.remove(value: gesture);
6163 if (conflicts)
6164 conflicts->insert(value: gesture);
6165 } else {
6166 normalGestures.insert(value: gesture);
6167 }
6168 if (targets)
6169 (*targets)[itemobj].insert(value: gesture);
6170 if (itemsSet)
6171 (*itemsSet).insert(value: itemobj);
6172 }
6173 }
6174 // Don't propagate through panels.
6175 if (item->isPanel())
6176 break;
6177 }
6178 }
6179 if (normal)
6180 *normal = normalGestures;
6181}
6182
6183void QGraphicsScenePrivate::gestureEventHandler(QGestureEvent *event)
6184{
6185 QWidget *viewport = event->widget();
6186 if (!viewport)
6187 return;
6188 QGraphicsView *graphicsView = qobject_cast<QGraphicsView *>(object: viewport->parent());
6189 if (!graphicsView)
6190 return;
6191
6192 const QList<QGesture *> allGestures = event->gestures();
6193 DEBUG() << "QGraphicsScenePrivate::gestureEventHandler:"
6194 << "Gestures:" << allGestures;
6195
6196 QSet<QGesture *> startedGestures;
6197 QPoint delta = viewport->mapFromGlobal(QPoint());
6198 QTransform toScene = QTransform::fromTranslate(dx: delta.x(), dy: delta.y())
6199 * graphicsView->viewportTransform().inverted();
6200 for (QGesture *gesture : allGestures) {
6201 // cache scene coordinates of the hot spot
6202 if (gesture->hasHotSpot()) {
6203 gesture->d_func()->sceneHotSpot = toScene.map(p: gesture->hotSpot());
6204 } else {
6205 gesture->d_func()->sceneHotSpot = QPointF();
6206 }
6207
6208 QGraphicsObject *target = gestureTargets.value(key: gesture, defaultValue: 0);
6209 if (!target) {
6210 // when we are not in started mode but don't have a target
6211 // then the only one interested in gesture is the view/scene
6212 if (gesture->state() == Qt::GestureStarted)
6213 startedGestures.insert(value: gesture);
6214 }
6215 }
6216
6217 if (!startedGestures.isEmpty()) {
6218 QSet<QGesture *> normalGestures; // that have just one target
6219 QSet<QGesture *> conflictedGestures; // that have multiple possible targets
6220 gestureTargetsAtHotSpots(gestures: startedGestures, flag: Qt::GestureFlag(0), targets: &cachedItemGestures, itemsSet: nullptr,
6221 normal: &normalGestures, conflicts: &conflictedGestures);
6222 cachedTargetItems = cachedItemGestures.keys();
6223 std::sort(first: cachedTargetItems.begin(), last: cachedTargetItems.end(), comp: qt_closestItemFirst);
6224 DEBUG() << "QGraphicsScenePrivate::gestureEventHandler:"
6225 << "Normal gestures:" << normalGestures
6226 << "Conflicting gestures:" << conflictedGestures;
6227
6228 // deliver conflicted gestures as override events AND remember
6229 // initial gesture targets
6230 if (!conflictedGestures.isEmpty()) {
6231 for (int i = 0; i < cachedTargetItems.size(); ++i) {
6232 QPointer<QGraphicsObject> item = cachedTargetItems.at(i);
6233
6234 // get gestures to deliver to the current item
6235 const QSet<QGesture *> gestures = conflictedGestures & cachedItemGestures.value(key: item.data());
6236 if (gestures.isEmpty())
6237 continue;
6238
6239 DEBUG() << "QGraphicsScenePrivate::gestureEventHandler:"
6240 << "delivering override to"
6241 << item.data() << gestures;
6242 // send gesture override
6243 QGestureEvent ev(gestures.values());
6244 ev.t = QEvent::GestureOverride;
6245 ev.setWidget(event->widget());
6246 // mark event and individual gestures as ignored
6247 ev.ignore();
6248 for (QGesture *g : gestures)
6249 ev.setAccepted(g, false);
6250 sendEvent(item: item.data(), event: &ev);
6251 // mark all accepted gestures to deliver them as normal gesture events
6252 for (QGesture *g : gestures) {
6253 if (ev.isAccepted() || ev.isAccepted(g)) {
6254 conflictedGestures.remove(value: g);
6255 // mark the item as a gesture target
6256 if (item) {
6257 gestureTargets.insert(key: g, value: item.data());
6258 QHash<QGraphicsObject *, QSet<QGesture *> >::iterator it, e;
6259 it = cachedItemGestures.begin();
6260 e = cachedItemGestures.end();
6261 for(; it != e; ++it)
6262 it.value().remove(value: g);
6263 cachedItemGestures[item.data()].insert(value: g);
6264 }
6265 DEBUG() << "QGraphicsScenePrivate::gestureEventHandler:"
6266 << "override was accepted:"
6267 << g << item.data();
6268 }
6269 // remember the first item that received the override event
6270 // as it most likely become a target if no one else accepts
6271 // the override event
6272 if (!gestureTargets.contains(key: g) && item)
6273 gestureTargets.insert(key: g, value: item.data());
6274
6275 }
6276 if (conflictedGestures.isEmpty())
6277 break;
6278 }
6279 }
6280 // remember the initial target item for each gesture that was not in
6281 // the conflicted state.
6282 if (!normalGestures.isEmpty()) {
6283 for (int i = 0; i < cachedTargetItems.size() && !normalGestures.isEmpty(); ++i) {
6284 QGraphicsObject *item = cachedTargetItems.at(i);
6285
6286 // get gestures to deliver to the current item
6287 const auto gestures = cachedItemGestures.value(key: item);
6288 for (QGesture *g : gestures) {
6289 if (!gestureTargets.contains(key: g)) {
6290 gestureTargets.insert(key: g, value: item);
6291 normalGestures.remove(value: g);
6292 }
6293 }
6294 }
6295 }
6296 }
6297
6298
6299 // deliver all gesture events
6300 QSet<QGesture *> undeliveredGestures;
6301 QSet<QGesture *> parentPropagatedGestures;
6302 for (QGesture *gesture : allGestures) {
6303 if (QGraphicsObject *target = gestureTargets.value(key: gesture, defaultValue: 0)) {
6304 cachedItemGestures[target].insert(value: gesture);
6305 cachedTargetItems.append(t: target);
6306 undeliveredGestures.insert(value: gesture);
6307 QGraphicsItemPrivate *d = target->QGraphicsItem::d_func();
6308 const Qt::GestureFlags flags = d->gestureContext.value(key: gesture->gestureType());
6309 if (flags & Qt::IgnoredGesturesPropagateToParent)
6310 parentPropagatedGestures.insert(value: gesture);
6311 } else {
6312 DEBUG() << "QGraphicsScenePrivate::gestureEventHandler:"
6313 << "no target for" << gesture << "at"
6314 << gesture->hotSpot() << gesture->d_func()->sceneHotSpot;
6315 }
6316 }
6317 std::sort(first: cachedTargetItems.begin(), last: cachedTargetItems.end(), comp: qt_closestItemFirst);
6318 for (int i = 0; i < cachedTargetItems.size(); ++i) {
6319 QPointer<QGraphicsObject> receiver = cachedTargetItems.at(i);
6320 const QSet<QGesture *> gestures = (undeliveredGestures
6321 & cachedItemGestures.value(key: receiver.data()))
6322 - cachedAlreadyDeliveredGestures.value(key: receiver.data());
6323
6324 if (gestures.isEmpty())
6325 continue;
6326
6327 cachedAlreadyDeliveredGestures[receiver.data()] += gestures;
6328 const bool isPanel = receiver.data()->isPanel();
6329
6330 DEBUG() << "QGraphicsScenePrivate::gestureEventHandler:"
6331 << "delivering to"
6332 << receiver.data() << gestures;
6333 QGestureEvent ev(gestures.values());
6334 ev.setWidget(event->widget());
6335 sendEvent(item: receiver.data(), event: &ev);
6336 QSet<QGesture *> ignoredGestures;
6337 for (QGesture *g : gestures) {
6338 if (!ev.isAccepted() && !ev.isAccepted(g)) {
6339 // if the gesture was ignored by its target, we will update the
6340 // targetItems list with a possible target items (items that
6341 // want to receive partial gestures).
6342 // ### won't work if the target was destroyed in the event
6343 // we will just stop delivering it.
6344 if (receiver && receiver.data() == gestureTargets.value(key: g, defaultValue: 0))
6345 ignoredGestures.insert(value: g);
6346 } else {
6347 if (receiver && g->state() == Qt::GestureStarted) {
6348 // someone accepted the propagated initial GestureStarted
6349 // event, let it be the new target for all following events.
6350 gestureTargets[g] = receiver.data();
6351 }
6352 undeliveredGestures.remove(value: g);
6353 }
6354 }
6355 if (undeliveredGestures.isEmpty())
6356 break;
6357
6358 // ignoredGestures list is only filled when delivering to the gesture
6359 // target item, so it is safe to assume item == target.
6360 if (!ignoredGestures.isEmpty() && !isPanel) {
6361 // look for new potential targets for gestures that were ignored
6362 // and should be propagated.
6363
6364 QSet<QGraphicsObject *> targetsSet(cachedTargetItems.constBegin(), cachedTargetItems.constEnd());
6365
6366 if (receiver) {
6367 // first if the gesture should be propagated to parents only
6368 for (QSet<QGesture *>::iterator it = ignoredGestures.begin();
6369 it != ignoredGestures.end();) {
6370 if (parentPropagatedGestures.contains(value: *it)) {
6371 QGesture *gesture = *it;
6372 const Qt::GestureType gestureType = gesture->gestureType();
6373 QGraphicsItem *item = receiver.data();
6374 while (item) {
6375 if (QGraphicsObject *obj = item->toGraphicsObject()) {
6376 if (item->d_func()->gestureContext.contains(key: gestureType)) {
6377 targetsSet.insert(value: obj);
6378 cachedItemGestures[obj].insert(value: gesture);
6379 }
6380 }
6381 if (item->isPanel())
6382 break;
6383 item = item->parentItem();
6384 }
6385
6386 it = ignoredGestures.erase(i: it);
6387 continue;
6388 }
6389 ++it;
6390 }
6391 }
6392
6393 gestureTargetsAtHotSpots(gestures: ignoredGestures, flag: Qt::ReceivePartialGestures,
6394 targets: &cachedItemGestures, itemsSet: &targetsSet, normal: nullptr, conflicts: nullptr);
6395
6396 cachedTargetItems = targetsSet.values();
6397 std::sort(first: cachedTargetItems.begin(), last: cachedTargetItems.end(), comp: qt_closestItemFirst);
6398 DEBUG() << "QGraphicsScenePrivate::gestureEventHandler:"
6399 << "new targets:" << cachedTargetItems;
6400 i = -1; // start delivery again
6401 continue;
6402 }
6403 }
6404
6405 for (QGesture *g : std::as_const(t&: startedGestures)) {
6406 if (g->gestureCancelPolicy() == QGesture::CancelAllInContext) {
6407 DEBUG() << "lets try to cancel some";
6408 // find gestures in context in Qt::GestureStarted or Qt::GestureUpdated state and cancel them
6409 cancelGesturesForChildren(original: g);
6410 }
6411 }
6412
6413 // forget about targets for gestures that have ended
6414 for (QGesture *g : allGestures) {
6415 switch (g->state()) {
6416 case Qt::GestureFinished:
6417 case Qt::GestureCanceled:
6418 gestureTargets.remove(key: g);
6419 break;
6420 default:
6421 break;
6422 }
6423 }
6424
6425 cachedTargetItems.clear();
6426 cachedItemGestures.clear();
6427 cachedAlreadyDeliveredGestures.clear();
6428}
6429
6430void QGraphicsScenePrivate::cancelGesturesForChildren(QGesture *original)
6431{
6432 Q_ASSERT(original);
6433 QGraphicsItem *originalItem = gestureTargets.value(key: original);
6434 if (originalItem == nullptr) // we only act on accepted gestures, which implies it has a target.
6435 return;
6436
6437 // iterate over all active gestures and for each find the owner
6438 // if the owner is part of our sub-hierarchy, cancel it.
6439
6440 QSet<QGesture *> canceledGestures;
6441 QHash<QGesture *, QGraphicsObject *>::Iterator iter = gestureTargets.begin();
6442 while (iter != gestureTargets.end()) {
6443 QGraphicsObject *item = iter.value();
6444 // note that we don't touch the gestures for our originalItem
6445 if (item != originalItem && originalItem->isAncestorOf(child: item)) {
6446 DEBUG() << " found a gesture to cancel" << iter.key();
6447 iter.key()->d_func()->state = Qt::GestureCanceled;
6448 canceledGestures << iter.key();
6449 }
6450 ++iter;
6451 }
6452
6453 // sort them per target item by cherry picking from almostCanceledGestures and delivering
6454 QSet<QGesture *> almostCanceledGestures = canceledGestures;
6455 QSet<QGesture *>::Iterator setIter;
6456 while (!almostCanceledGestures.isEmpty()) {
6457 QGraphicsObject *target = nullptr;
6458 QSet<QGesture*> gestures;
6459 setIter = almostCanceledGestures.begin();
6460 // sort per target item
6461 while (setIter != almostCanceledGestures.end()) {
6462 QGraphicsObject *item = gestureTargets.value(key: *setIter);
6463 if (target == nullptr)
6464 target = item;
6465 if (target == item) {
6466 gestures << *setIter;
6467 setIter = almostCanceledGestures.erase(i: setIter);
6468 } else {
6469 ++setIter;
6470 }
6471 }
6472 Q_ASSERT(target);
6473
6474 const QList<QGesture *> list = gestures.values();
6475 QGestureEvent ev(list);
6476 sendEvent(item: target, event: &ev);
6477
6478 if (!ev.isAccepted()) {
6479 for (QGesture *g : list) {
6480
6481 if (ev.isAccepted(g))
6482 continue;
6483
6484 if (!g->hasHotSpot())
6485 continue;
6486
6487 const QList<QGraphicsItem *> items = itemsAtPosition(screenPos: QPoint(), scenePos: g->d_func()->sceneHotSpot, widget: nullptr);
6488 for (const auto &item : items) {
6489 QGraphicsObject *object = item->toGraphicsObject();
6490 if (!object)
6491 continue;
6492 QGraphicsItemPrivate *d = object->QGraphicsItem::d_func();
6493 if (d->gestureContext.contains(key: g->gestureType())) {
6494 QList<QGesture *> list;
6495 list << g;
6496 QGestureEvent ev(list);
6497 sendEvent(item: object, event: &ev);
6498 if (ev.isAccepted() || ev.isAccepted(g))
6499 break; // successfully delivered
6500 }
6501 }
6502 }
6503 }
6504 }
6505
6506 QGestureManager *gestureManager = QApplicationPrivate::instance()->gestureManager;
6507 Q_ASSERT(gestureManager); // it would be very odd if we got called without a manager.
6508 for (setIter = canceledGestures.begin(); setIter != canceledGestures.end(); ++setIter) {
6509 gestureManager->recycle(gesture: *setIter);
6510 gestureTargets.remove(key: *setIter);
6511 }
6512}
6513
6514void QGraphicsScenePrivate::grabGesture(QGraphicsItem *, Qt::GestureType gesture)
6515{
6516 (void)QGestureManager::instance(); // create a gesture manager
6517 if (!grabbedGestures[gesture]++) {
6518 for (QGraphicsView *view : std::as_const(t&: views))
6519 view->viewport()->grabGesture(type: gesture);
6520 }
6521}
6522
6523void QGraphicsScenePrivate::ungrabGesture(QGraphicsItem *item, Qt::GestureType gesture)
6524{
6525 // we know this can only be an object
6526 Q_ASSERT(item->d_ptr->isObject);
6527 QGraphicsObject *obj = static_cast<QGraphicsObject *>(item);
6528 QGestureManager::instance()->cleanupCachedGestures(target: obj, type: gesture);
6529 if (!--grabbedGestures[gesture]) {
6530 for (QGraphicsView *view : std::as_const(t&: views))
6531 view->viewport()->ungrabGesture(type: gesture);
6532 }
6533}
6534#endif // QT_NO_GESTURES
